title: Bug 31027major error from minor whitespace error in properties file
description: Bug 31027major error from minor whitespace error in properties file A developer accidentally placed a tab character after the port number in theproperties file for a tomcat instance.This prevented tomcat from listening onthat port, but it was difficult to track down whether tomcat was running.Seemslike the propertiesfile reader could easily trim excess whitespace beforetrying to use entries.
